metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: •  Return chicken to the skillet and cook until heated through.
o  Scramble eggs in the same pan.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Chicken Caesar Wrap:
1 whole wheat tortilla - 1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced - 1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped - - 2 tablespoons Caesar dressing - 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese - Optional: croutons for extra crunch.

Chicken Caesar Wrap:
- Lay the tortilla flat and spread the Caesar dressing evenly. - Add the chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese. - Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

- Return chicken to the skillet and cook until heated through.:
- Return chicken to the skillet and cook until heated through. - Serve warm.

- Return chicken to the skillet and cook until heated through.:
- 1 whole duck - 1/4 cup soy sauce - 1/4 cup honey - 2 tablespoons hoisin sauce - 2 tablespoons rice vinegar - 2 cloves garlic, minced - 1 teaspoon five-spice powder - 1 teaspoon grated ginger - 1/4 cup green onions, sliced - Mandarin pancakes for serving.

o Scramble eggs in the same pan.:
o 1 cup flour o 1 cup water o 1 egg o 1/2 cup green onions o 1/2 cup seafood (optional) o 1 tablespoon soy sauce o 1 tablespoon sesame oil.

o Scramble eggs in the same pan.:
o Mix flour, water, and beaten egg in a bowl. o Add chopped green onions and seafood (if using). o Heat sesame oil in a pan and pour in batter. o Cook until golden on both sides. o Serve with soy sauce for dipping.

o 1 cup water:
o 1 cup water o 1/2 cup butter o 1 cup flour o 3 eggs o 1/4 cup sugar o 1 teaspoon cinnamon o Oil for frying.

o 1 cup water:
o Bring water and butter to a boil. o Add flour and stir until a dough forms. o Remove from heat and beat in eggs one at a time. o Heat oil in a pan. o Pipe dough into hot oil and fry until golden. o Drain on paper towels and roll in a mixture of sugar and cinnamon. o Serve warm.

- 1 teaspoon thyme:
- 1 teaspoon thyme - 1 teaspoon rosemary - 1/4 cup olive oil - Salt and pepper to taste.

- 1 teaspoon thyme:
In a large baking dish, layer diced eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, onion, and tomatoes. In a bowl, mix minced garlic, olive oil, thyme, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
